data.event: In 1896, Shuri was made a ward (区, ku) of the new prefectural capital, Naha, though it was made a separate city again in 1921.

event.title: was made a separate city again in 1921

data.event: In 1896, Shuri was made a ward (区, ku) of the new prefectural capital, Naha, though it was made a separate city again in 1921.
Shuri was merged into Naha in 1954.

event.title: divided into the three kingdoms of Hokuzan, Nanzan, and Chūzan; nearly two centuries

data.event: This was nearly a century before Okinawa Island would become divided into the three kingdoms of Hokuzan, Nanzan, and Chūzan; nearly two centuries before the unification of those kingdoms and establishment of the Ryūkyū Kingdom.
